name: Gray Block Robots
description:
A game made for the 9 Day Jam #7!

Play as a series of small, blocky robots in an abandoned facility, and help them restore power to it through the use of various attachments that allow them to navigate across the level!

Controls:

W A S D to move

Left Click to use the robot's currently equipped arm function

Space Bar to jump, Hold to Hover with the Hover Pack
